Class Worker

java.lang.Object
  cz.muni.fi.pv168.clockcard.Worker
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDatabaseStoreable
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDatabaseStoreable

Class that represents worker who is using the ClockCard system.

loadWorker

public static Worker loadWorker(long id,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String surname,
                                java.lang.String login,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                long currentShift,
                                boolean suspended)
Static constructor used for constructing a Worker that has been previously saved to the database.

Parameters:
id - worker's unique ID
name - worker's name
surname - worker's surname
login - worker's login
password - worker's password
currentShift - date and time of worker's pending shift
suspended - whether worker is suspended or not
Returns:
newly created worker

Resets password of the selected worker to the default value.

Parameters:
worker - worker whose password is being reset

startShift

public void startShift()
                throws cz.muni.fi.pv168.clockcard.WorkerException
Starts a new shift. Provided that worker is suspended or already has a pending shift throws a WorkerException.

Throws:
WorkerException

endShift

public void endShift()
              throws cz.muni.fi.pv168.clockcard.WorkerException
Ends pending shift. Provided that worker is suspended or has not a pending shift, throws a WorkerException.

Throws:
WorkerException

startBreak

public void startBreak()
                throws cz.muni.fi.pv168.clockcard.WorkerException
Starts a break at current shift. Provided that Worker is not saved, is suspended or is already on break throws WorkerException.

Throws:
WorkerException

endBreak

public void endBreak()
              throws cz.muni.fi.pv168.clockcard.WorkerException
Ends a break at current shift. Provided that Worker is not saved, is suspended or worker has no break to end, throws WorkerException.

Throws:
WorkerException

suspend

public void suspend()
             throws cz.muni.fi.pv168.clockcard.WorkerException
Suspends worker. Provided that worker is already suspended, throws WorkerException.

Throws:
WorkerException

unsuspend

public void unsuspend()
               throws cz.muni.fi.pv168.clockcard.WorkerException
Cancels previous suspension. Provided that worker is not suspended, throws IllegalArgumentException.

Throws:
WorkerException
